text: Colin Campbell McDonald (17 November 1928 â€“ 11 January 2021) was an Australian cricketer. He played in 47 Test matches for his country from 1952 to 1961. He also played in 192 first-class matches between 1947 and 1963. McDonald was born in Glen Iris, Victoria. McDonald died in Melbourne, Victoria, on 11 January 2021. He was 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Victoria (Australia)
title: Colin McDonald (Australian cricketer)
